BR_text.BRsummary: time_feature for Easter raised error for target date on 2018-10-06
BR_text.BRdescription: I encountered error message "ssertionError: No closest holiday for the date index 2018-10-06 00:00:00 found." when creating time feature for holidays. The current setting MAX_WINDOW = 183 + 4 failed for Easter Sunday with target date index on 2018-10-06. And here is the source code I am looking at: src/gluonts/time_feature/holiday.py.
